author: Luc Olinga
title: Why You Should Care About This War Over the Future of Money
description: A legendary short seller who took down Enron is in open combat with the CEO who has staked his entire company on Bitcoin. Their fight is about more than just one stock; it’s a high-stakes war over the future of money itself.
content: The crypto world is buzzing. If you ask a true believer, theyll say this is just the beginning of a financial revolution. Ask a skeptic, and theyll swear were watching a bubble inflate in real time, … [+3958 chars]
